channel.title: Dié Tang's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Dié Tang's Personal Website

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Research
item.description: Dié Tang, Ph.D., Bioinformatics BSc, Chongqing University Exchange student, Université Toulouse III MSc, Agricultural Genomics Insitute at Shenzhen, CAAS Ph.D. Agricultural Genomics Insitute at Shenzhen, CAAS Postdoc, Yale University Email: die.tang@yale.edu ORCID Research Gate Google Scholar Research Interests Computational Model of regulatory code Post-transcriptional regulation is critical in determing cellular phenotypes and behavior. I am currently combining computational methods to identify the cell-type-specific RNA regulatory code underlying development and disease.
